subject: Football
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Three Houston police officers who were accused of beating the father of Green Bay Packers wide receiver Donald Driver have filed a defamation lawsuit, saying Marvin Driver Jr. and activist Quanell X made false statements about Driver’s November arrest.
